source:
%%sql
-- Build ims_entity_dim table -- merge

-- Notes - Addresses are only supplied for Inspectors - need to check inspector count against addresses data

-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW ims_entity_dim_new 

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.ropa_id IS NULL
        THEN T3.IMSROPAID
        ELSE NULL
    END                                     AS IMSROPAID, -- surrogate key
    T1.ropa_id	AS	ROPAIDLegacy	,
    T1.id	AS	ROPAIDCoded	,
    T1.name	AS	ROPAName	,
    T1.assigned_user_id	AS	ROPAAssignedUserID	,
    T1.assigned_user_name	AS	ROPAAssignedUserName	,
    T1.ims_ropa_number	AS	IMSROPANumber	,
    T1.type	AS	ROPAType	,
    T1.status	AS	ROPAStatus	,
    T1.priority	AS	ROPAPriority	,
    T1.organisation_areas_c	AS	ROPAOrganisationAreas	,
    T1.data_controllers_c	AS	ROPADataControllers	,
    T1.joint_controller_c	AS	ROPAJointController	,
    T1.categories_of_personal_data_c	AS	ROPACategoriesPersonalData	,
    T1.categories_of_recipients_c	AS	ROPACategoriesRecipients	,
    T1.security_measures_c	AS	ROPASecurityMeasures	,
    T1.third_country_names_c	AS	ThirdCountryNames	,
    T1.third_country_safeguards_c	AS	ThirdCountrySafeguards	,
    T1.legitimate_interest_c	AS	ROPALegitimateInterest	,
    T1.automated_decision_making_c	AS	ROPAAutomatedDecisionMaking	,
    T1.data_source_c	AS	ROPADataSource	,
    T1.records_of_consent_c	AS	ROPARecordsOfConsent	,
    T1.location_of_data_c	AS	ROPADataLocation	,
    T1.dpia_required_c	AS	DPIARequired	,
    T1.dpia_status_c	AS	DPIAStatus	,
    T1.retention_policy_c	AS	ROPARetentionPolicy	,
    T1.retention_policy_applied_c	AS	ROPARetentionPolicyApplied	,
    T1.data_breach_record_c	AS	ROPADataBreachRecord	,
    T1.retention_not_adhered_c	AS	ROPARetentionNotAdhered	,
    T1.privacy_notice_c	AS	ROPAPrivacyNote	,
    T1.categories_of_individuals_c	AS	ROPACategoriesIndividuals	,
    T1.ropa_num_container_c	AS	ROPANumberContainer	,
    T1.help	AS	ROPAHelp	,
    T1.retention_schedule	AS	ROPARetentionSchedule	,
    T1.business_function	AS	ROPABusinessFunction	,
    T1.dpo	AS	ROPADPO	,
    T1.data_breach_occurred_c	AS	ROPADataBreachOcurred	,
    T1.last_current_and_accurate_da_c	AS	ROPALastCurrentAccurateData	,
    T1.gdpr_lawful_basis_c	AS	GDPRLawfulBasis	,
    T1.gdpr_special_category_conditio	AS	GDPRSpecialCategoryConditions	,
    T1.dpa_2018_sch1_condition_c	AS	DPA2018Schedule1Condition	,
    T1.rights_of_data_subject_c	AS	RightsOfDataSubject	,
    T1.business_function_unstructured	AS	BusinessFunctioinUnstructured	,
    T1.bdc_entity_temp_c	AS	BDCEntityTemp	,
    T1.cat_of_individuals_temp_c	AS	ROPACategoriesIndividualsTemp	,
    T1.documents_ims_ropa_1	AS	DocumentsIMSROPA	,
    T1.documents_ims_ropa_1_name	AS	DocumentsIMSROPAName	,
    T1.documents_ims_ropa_1documents_ida	AS	DocumentsIMSROPADocumentsIDA	,
    T1.ims_ropa_ims_integration_1	AS	IMSROPAIMSIntegration	,
    T1.estimated_number_of_operator_c	AS	EstimatedNumberOperator	,
    T1.user_id_c	AS	ROPAUserID	,
    T1.information_owner_c	AS	ROPAInformationOwner	,
    T1.user_id1_c	AS	ROPAUser1CID	,
    T1.information_expert_c	AS	ROPAInformationExpert	,             
    T1.ims_ropa_documents_1	AS	IMSROPADocuments	,
    T1.gdpr_lawful_basis_ms_c	AS	GDPRLawfulBasisMS	,
    T1.gdpr_special_cat_condition_m_c	AS	GDPRSpecialCategoryConditionsMS	,
    T1.dpa_2018_sch1_condition_ms_c	AS	DPA2018Schedule1ConditionMS	,
    T1.date_modified	AS	IMSROPADateModified	,
    T4.securitygroups	AS	SecurityGroups	,
    T4.assigned_user_link	AS	AssignedUserLink	,
    T4.created_by	AS	CreatedBy	,
    T4.created_by_link	AS	CreatedByLink	,
    T4.created_by_name	AS	CreatedByName	,
    T4.data_entered	AS	DateEntered	,
    T4.deleted	AS	Deleted	,
    T4.description	AS	Description	,
    T4.modified_by_name	AS	ModifiedByName	,
    T4.modified_user_id	AS	ModifiedUserID	,
    T4.modified_user_link	AS	ModifiedUserLink	,
    T4.resolution	AS	Resolution	,
    T4.rights_of_data_subject_table_c	AS	RightsOfDataSubjectTableC	,
    T4.rights_of_the_data_subject_c	AS	RightsOfTheDataSubjectC	,
    T4.work_log	AS	WorkLog	,

    T2.SourceSystemID                       AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)          AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                    AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.ropa_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_ropa_number,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.type,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.priority,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.organisation_areas_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.data_controllers_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.joint_controller_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.categories_of_personal_data_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.categories_of_recipients_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.security_measures_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.third_country_names_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.third_country_safeguards_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.legitimate_interest_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.automated_decision_making_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.data_source_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.records_of_consent_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.location_of_data_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.dpia_required_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.dpia_status_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.retention_policy_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.retention_policy_applied_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.data_breach_record_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.retention_not_adhered_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.privacy_notice_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.categories_of_individuals_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ropa_num_container_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.help			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.retention_schedule			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.business_function			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.dpo			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.data_breach_occurred_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.last_current_and_accurate_da_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.gdpr_lawful_basis_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.gdpr_special_category_conditio			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.dpa_2018_sch1_condition_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.rights_of_data_subject_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.business_function_unstructured			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_temp_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.cat_of_individuals_temp_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.documents_ims_ropa_1			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.documents_ims_ropa_1_name			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.documents_ims_ropa_1documents_ida			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_ropa_ims_integration_1			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.estimated_number_of_operator_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.user_id_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.information_owner_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.user_id1_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.information_expert_c			,	'.'),              
        IFNULL(T1.ims_ropa_documents_1			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.gdpr_lawful_basis_ms_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.gdpr_special_cat_condition_m_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.dpa_2018_sch1_condition_ms_c			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_modified			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T4.securitygroups			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T4.assigned_user_link			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T4.created_by			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T4.created_by_link			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T4.created_by_name			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T4.data_entered			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T4.deleted			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T4.description			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T4.modified_by_name			,	'.'), 
        IFNULL(T4.modified_user_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T4.modified_user_link,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T4.resolution,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T4.rights_of_data_subject_table_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T4.rights_of_the_data_subject_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T4.work_log,'.') AS RowID, 
    'Y'                                     AS IsActive, 
    T3.IsActive                             AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_entity T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON  "IMS" = T2.Description AND 
        T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.ims_entity_dim T3 
    ON  T1.bdce_id = T3.BDCID AND 
        T3.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.ims_ropa_new T4 
    ON T1.

WHERE
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN    T1.bdce_id = T3.BDCID AND 
                    md5(concat(
                        IFNULL(T1.bdce_id,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.id,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_number,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_name_container_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_num_container,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.business_area_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_data_flow_1,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_data_flow_2,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.user_id_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.information_owner_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.user_id1_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.information_expert_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.type,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.priority,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.resolution,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.work_log,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.business_criticality,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_modified,'.'))) <> T3.RowID     
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T3.IMSEntityID IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' )
    AND T1.bdce_id IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_dpia);

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **ims_entity_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View ims_entity_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW ims_entity_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

SELECT DISTINCT
    IMSEntityID,
    BDCID,
    BDCIDCoded,
    BDCEntityName,
    BDCEntityNumber,
    BDCEntityNameContainer,
    BDCEntityNumberContainer,
    BDCEntityBusinessArea,
    BDCEntityIMSDataFlow1,
    BDCEntityIMSDataFlow2,
    BDCEntityBDCAttribute,
    BDCEntityUserID,
    BDCEntityInformationOwner,
    BDCEntityUser1ID,
    BDCEntityInformationExpert,
    BDCEntityType,
    BDCEntityStatus,
    BDCEntityPriority,
    BDCEntityResolution,
    BDCEntityWorkLog,
    BDCEntityBusinessCriticality,
    IMSEntityDateModified,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From ims_entity_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT DISTINCT
    IMSEntityID,
    BDCID,
    BDCIDCoded,
    BDCEntityName,
    BDCEntityNumber,
    BDCEntityNameContainer,
    BDCEntityNumberContainer,
    BDCEntityBusinessArea,
    BDCEntityIMSDataFlow1,
    BDCEntityIMSDataFlow2,
    BDCEntityBDCAttribute,
    BDCEntityUserID,
    BDCEntityInformationOwner,
    BDCEntityUser1ID,
    BDCEntityInformationExpert,
    BDCEntityType,
    BDCEntityStatus,
    BDCEntityPriority,
    BDCEntityResolution,
    BDCEntityWorkLog,
    BDCEntityBusinessCriticality,
    IMSEntityDateModified,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.ims_entity_dim
WHERE BDCID IN (SELECT BDCID FROM ims_entity_dim_new WHERE IMSEntityID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM ims_entity_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW ims_entity_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    IMSEntityID,
    BDCID,
    BDCIDCoded,
    BDCEntityName,
    BDCEntityNumber,
    BDCEntityNameContainer,
    BDCEntityNumberContainer,
    BDCEntityBusinessArea,
    BDCEntityIMSDataFlow1,
    BDCEntityIMSDataFlow2,
    BDCEntityBDCAttribute,
    BDCEntityUserID,
    BDCEntityInformationOwner,
    BDCEntityUser1ID,
    BDCEntityInformationExpert,
    BDCEntityType,
    BDCEntityStatus,
    BDCEntityPriority,
    BDCEntityResolution,
    BDCEntityWorkLog,
    BDCEntityBusinessCriticality,
    IMSEntityDateModified,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM ims_entity_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View ims_entity_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. Pers_No from SAP HR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.ims_entity_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.ims_entity_dim AS Target
USING ims_entity_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.IMSEntityID = Target.IMSEntityID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (IMSEntityID,
        BDCID,
        BDCIDCoded,
        BDCEntityName,
        BDCEntityNumber,
        BDCEntityNameContainer,
        BDCEntityNumberContainer,
        BDCEntityBusinessArea,
        BDCEntityIMSDataFlow1,
        BDCEntityIMSDataFlow2,
        BDCEntityBDCAttribute,
        BDCEntityUserID,
        BDCEntityInformationOwner,
        BDCEntityUser1ID,
        BDCEntityInformationExpert,
        BDCEntityType,
        BDCEntityStatus,
        BDCEntityPriority,
        BDCEntityResolution,
        BDCEntityWorkLog,
        BDCEntityBusinessCriticality,
        IMSEntityDateModified,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.IMSEntityID,
        Source.BDCID,
        Source.BDCIDCoded,
        Source.BDCEntityName,
        Source.BDCEntityNumber,
        Source.BDCEntityNameContainer,
        Source.BDCEntityNumberContainer,
        Source.BDCEntityBusinessArea,
        Source.BDCEntityIMSDataFlow1,
        Source.BDCEntityIMSDataFlow2,
        Source.BDCEntityBDCAttribute,
        Source.BDCEntityUserID,
        Source.BDCEntityInformationOwner,
        Source.BDCEntityUser1ID,
        Source.BDCEntityInformationExpert,
        Source.BDCEntityType,
        Source.BDCEntityStatus,
        Source.BDCEntityPriority,
        Source.BDCEntityResolution,
        Source.BDCEntityWorkLog,
        Source.BDCEntityBusinessCriticality,
        Source.IMSEntityDateModified,
        Source.SourceSystemID, 
        Source.IngestionDate, 
        Source.ValidTo, 
        Source.RowID, 
        Source.IsActive) ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.ims_entity_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new SecureInfoID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.ims_entity_dim 

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY IMSEntityID,BDCID NULLS LAST) AS IMSEntityID,
    BDCID,
    BDCIDCoded,
    BDCEntityName,
    BDCEntityNumber,
    BDCEntityNameContainer,
    BDCEntityNumberContainer,
    BDCEntityBusinessArea,
    BDCEntityIMSDataFlow1,
    BDCEntityIMSDataFlow2,
    BDCEntityBDCAttribute,
    BDCEntityUserID,
    BDCEntityInformationOwner,
    BDCEntityUser1ID,
    BDCEntityInformationExpert,
    BDCEntityType,
    BDCEntityStatus,
    BDCEntityPriority,
    BDCEntityResolution,
    BDCEntityWorkLog,
    BDCEntityBusinessCriticality,
    IMSEntityDateModified,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.ims_entity_dim ;
